subject: College Athletics
Hockey, Ice
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: Union College, a liberal-arts institution of 2,200 students in Schenectady, N.Y., faces Michigan State Friday in a first-round game of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.
snippet: Union College, a liberal-arts institution of 2,200 students in Schenectady, N.Y., faces Michigan State Friday in a first-round game of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.
